meanings.definition: Likely to happen or be true
meanings.sent1: The sunny weather makes a picnic seem probables.
meanings.sent2: The teacher said it was probables that the test would be easy.
meanings.sent3: It's probables that the cat will chase its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The probables outcome of the game was a tie.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds made rain probables.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is likely to be chosen or succeed
meanings.sent1: Among the candidates, she was one of the probables for the job.
meanings.sent2: The coach considered him one of the probables for the team captain.
meanings.sent3: The probables for the lead role in the play were all talented actors.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as one of the probables for the scholarship.
meanings.sent5: The probables for the award were announced at the ceremony.
